Gracias por hacer posible La Brújula: Thank you for making La Brújula possible
landingParagraph: For 14 years, we have been dedicated to bringing together people, companies, and institutions from the audiovisual and film industry so that you can find them in one place.<1></1><2>At La Brújula, we keep building!</2>
regionalGuides: Download the regional directories to use <2>La Brújula</2> offline
specialGuides: Use our special directories, made possible by our allied states
heroTitle: La Brújula.<1></1>Networking for the audiovisual and film industry.
contactCTA: Contact the person, company, or institution you need for your project
¿No encuentras lo que buscas?: Can't find what you're looking for?
landing: Download La Brújula in PDF to use it offline
